room_title: Escape room "Monopoly Mania" by Ready-Set-Escape in Smithfield
review: We had a blast! The monopoly room was amazing. This was our first escape room experience, but it definitely won’t be our last.

room_title: Escape room "Monopoly Mania" by Ready-Set-Escape in Smithfield
review: My friends and I had a great time... puzzles are fun!! They customize the challenge according to your preference and experience! We escaped from the Monopoly room and we’re already planning on coming back for the Hollywood Heist!
